comments.author: angela
comments.body: href is now encoded in the  XmlUtil.hrefToXml, which is consistently used to build the DAV:href element.

description: the url in an href element of a dav response should be url-escaped. currently at least one webdav client (os x's webdavfs) chokes on unescaped urls (such as /home/bcm/file with spaces in its name.txt).
summary: hrefs in dav responses should be url-escaped
